Package veslo.bean.template

Class TemplateMapper

java.lang.Object
veslo.bean.template.TemplateMapper
public class TemplateMapper
extends Object
Reads a text template from a file using the TemplateSource annotation. Replace strings in a template with values from fields using a regular expression from TemplateReplaceAll annotation.

* @Getter * @Setter * @Accessors(chain = true, fluent = true) * @TemplateSource(type = RESOURCE, path = "Notes.xml") * public static final class Notes { * * @TemplateReplaceAll(regex = "\\[note.to]") * private String to; * @TemplateReplaceAll(regex = "replace_note_from") * private String from; * @TemplateReplaceAll(regex = "\\{note_body_content}") * private String bodyContent; * * }

Author:
Oleg Shaburov (shaburov.o.a@gmail.com) Created: 18.02.2022

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static String marshal​(Object template)
    Reads the template body according to the data from the TemplateSource annotation.
    static String readTemplate​(Object template)
    Reads the contents of the file passed in the TemplateSource annotation, where - TemplateSource.path() - source file path - TemplateSource.type() - source type (TemplateSourceType.FILE or TemplateSourceType.RESOURCE) - TemplateSource.charset() - source file charset (UTF-8 by default)

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • marshal

      @EverythingIsNonNull public static String marshal​(Object template)
      Reads the template body according to the data from the TemplateSource annotation. Replace blocks of text in the template that match a regular expression. The regular expression is taken from the TemplateReplaceAll.regex(). The value is taken from the corresponding field, which is marked with the TemplateReplaceAll annotation.
      Parameters:
      template - - java bean with TemplateSource annotation
      Returns:
      filled template with values from fields marked with TemplateReplaceAll annotation
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if template is null

    • readTemplate

      @EverythingIsNonNull public static String readTemplate​(Object template)
      Reads the contents of the file passed in the TemplateSource annotation, where - TemplateSource.path() - source file path - TemplateSource.type() - source type (TemplateSourceType.FILE or TemplateSourceType.RESOURCE) - TemplateSource.charset() - source file charset (UTF-8 by default)
      Parameters:
      template - - java bean with TemplateSource annotation
      Returns:
      file content from TemplateSource annotation
      Throws:
      TemplateException - if TemplateSource annotation not present
      TemplateException - if TemplateSource.charset() is not supported
      NullPointerException - if template is null
